scripts.package-thales-key: node_modules/.bin/tsc thales-key.ts; node_modules/.bin/pkg -t node14 thales-key.js; rm thales-key.js
scripts.thales-launch: yarn run build-thales-launch && mkdir -p specFiles && ts-node thales-launch.ts
scripts.thales-test: yarn run build-thales-launch && mkdir -p specFiles && ts-node thales-test.ts
scripts.test-staking: yarn run build-thales-launch && mkdir -p specFiles && ts-node test-staking.ts
